values.title: Friedrich Nietzsche
values.desc: It is not a lack of love but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages

values.title: Jane Austen
values.desc: It is a truth universally acknowledged that a single man in possession of a good fortune must be in want of a wife

values.title: Jon Krakauer
values.desc: Happiness is only real when shared

values.title: Charlotte Bront
values.desc: The trouble is not that I am single and likely to stay single. but that I am lonely and likely to stay lonely

values.title: Elizabeth Gilbert
values.desc: To be fully seen by somebody then and be loved anyhow  this is a human offering that can border on miraculous

values.title: PG Wodehouse
values.desc: And she's got brains enough for two, which is the exact quantity the girl who marries you will need

values.title: Martha Gellhorn
values.desc: I know enough to know that no woman should ever marry a man who hated his mother

values.title: Cher
values.desc: The trouble with some women is that they get all excited about nothing  and then marry him

values.title: T D Jakes
values.desc: No woman wants to be in submission to a man who isn't in submission to God

values.title: Katharine Hepburn
values.desc: Sometimes I wonder if men and women really suit each other Perhaps they should live next door and just visit now and then

values.title: Audrey Hepburn
values.desc: If I get married. I want to be very married

values.title: Margaret Atwood
values.desc: Longed for him. Got him. Shit!

values.title: Mae West
values.desc: Marriage is a fine institution. but Im not ready for an institution
